title: Ticket #3852: Debian 5 is at end of life - remove from release
description: Debian 5 will no longer be released. It is at end of life.
remarks:
2013-Aug-13 09:51:35 by smoler:
Commits were made without this ticket:

SHA1 19f5419db2f05042870455f60cab97a026048b92

and

SHA1 9376c85df11a6319d7de69b86175d26148670255

2013-Aug-13 09:59:18 by smoler:
In the manual, definitions of machine ClassAd attributes still refer to Debian 5. These definitions will remain for now. They may be removed in the future, but folks may want to know the values and what they were for Debian 5. They are in file misc/machad.tex.

2013-Aug-16 10:20:59 by tim:
CODE REVIEW The change is right.
